Sentencas: This paper deals with the monitoring of the internal condition of a 6-cell solid oxide fuel cell stack during a 3600-hour test with short fuel starvation intervals.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: The relationship between change in condition and change of impedance spectra as well as the parameters of the equivalent circuit models are analysed.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: Tentative features indicating reduced fuel supply are identified.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: The analysis uses discrete random binary sequence, a stochastic broadband excitation signal that allows much shorter perturbation times.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: More than 600 electrochemical impedance spectroscopy curves and the associated equivalent circuit model parameters were analysed.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: High fuel utilisation interval is detected in two ways: (i) by violating the Z-HIT test in the low-frequency part (below approximate to 1 Hz) and (ii) significant change of the area-specific resistance parameter.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: The degradation after fuel cut-offs is clearly reflected in the change in area-specific resistance and the serial resistance.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply

Sentencas: The numerical implementation of the proposed algorithms is available at: https://repo.ijs.si/pboskoski/py_eis.git.
Titulo: Condition monitoring of solid oxide fuel cells by fast electrochemical impedance spectroscopy: A case example of detecting deficiencies in fuel supply
